dt: {bc}any of various trees having {a_link|yellowish} wood or yielding a {a_link|yellow} extract
{bc}a leguminous tree ({it}Cladrastis lutea{/it}) of the southern U.S. having showy white fragrant flowers and yielding a yellow dye

shortdef: any of various trees having yellowish wood or yielding a yellow extract; especially : a leguminous tree (Cladrastis lutea) of the southern U.S. having showy white fragrant flowers and yielding a yellow dye
the wood of a yellowwood tree
